title: "Humanitarian Catastrophe Coming": EU On Russia Striking Ukraine Power Grid
summary_full: EU top diplomat Kaja Kallas warned Thursday that Ukraine was facing a "humanitarian catastrophe" as Russian strikes cut power in frigid winter conditions.
summary_public: EU top diplomat Kaja Kallas warned Thursday that Ukraine was facing a "humanitarian catastrophe" as Russian strikes cut power in frigid winter conditions.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: EU On Russia Striking Ukraine Power Grid
